ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 25 New Everquest Spoilers
ygData.msgSnippet:
go to membership list, click on edit next to their name then change it there
to moderated, you can do the same to anyone that way Flaumigavylke 56 BST Aracana
ygData.messageBody:
go to membership list, click on edit next to their name then change it there to moderated, you can do the same to anyone that way

Hmm...
If I knew how to put him on moderated status I would. But Yahoo has rearranged things. It used to be so much simpler and now it's a pain trying to figure out which section the setting changes and stuff are in. I remember when this was EverQuest at onelist.com.. then egroups... I'll try to keep an eye on things.
luv,

>    If he posts that message again he's getting kicked.
> I wasn't sure if he posted here more than once or if it was just that
> I saw it on other lists.

It was his 3rd post advertising that particular website. It was also his
3rd post full stop.

The first was a short one on the 10th, the second and third were
essentially identical, just different subject lines, on the 14th and
18th.

Matt
